advice.message: Capitalize on increasing your calorie intake through nutrient-dense, balanced meals, and regular strength training while seeking guidance from a healthcare professional for a safe and sustainable approach to weight gain

Maintain your current weight by following a balanced diet, staying physically active, and prioritizing overall health and well-being. Regular exercise, a diet rich in nutrients, and healthy lifestyle choices are essential for long-term health maintenance

Aim to achieve and maintain a healthy weight by adopting a balanced diet, increasing physical activity, and making lifestyle changes that promote long-term health. This may involve calorie control, portion management, regular exercise, and consulting with healthcare professionals or registered dietitians to create a personalized weight management plan

Prioritize significant weight loss and overall health improvement. Implement a carefully managed, reduced-calorie diet, engage in regular physical activity, and seek ongoing support from healthcare professionals, including registered dietitians and physicians. Lifestyle changes, sustainable dietary choices, and a commitment to long-term health are essential in managing obesity
